briefTitle: Study to Evaluate Immunogenicity and Safety Study of GSK Biologicals' Herpes Zoster (HZ) Vaccine GSK1437173A When Co-administered With Pneumovax 23™ in Adults Aged 50 Years and Older
officialTitle: Immunogenicity and Safety Study of GSK Biologicals' Herpes Zoster Vaccine GSK1437173A When Co-administered With Pneumovax 23™ in Adults Aged 50 Years and Older

interventions.name: Licensed pneumococcal polysaccharide conjugate vaccine (23-valent, adsorbed), Pneumovax 23™

summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the immunogenicity, reactogenicity and safety of the GSK Biologicals HZ/su candidate vaccine when its first dose is co-administered with Pneumovax 23™ vaccine in adults aged 50 years or older.The impact of HZ/su vaccine on Pneumovax 23™ vaccine immune response will also be evaluated.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects With a Vaccine Response for Anti-gE Antibodies
